subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Miguel Cotto became the World Boxing Organization welterweight champion when he stopped Michael Jennings 2 minutes 36 seconds into the fifth round at Madison Square Garden. Cotto (33-1, 27 knockouts) landed a steady barrage of head and body shots to drop Jennings twice in the fourth round and once in the fifth before the fight was stopped.
